verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. The heavens <WH8064> declare <WH5608> the glory <WH3519> of God <WH410>; And the firmament <WH7549> showeth his <WH5046> handiwork <WH4639>.
Day <WH3117> unto day <WH3117> uttereth <WH5042> speech <WH562>, And night <WH3915> unto night <WH3915> showeth <WH2331> knowledge <WH1847>.
There is no speech <WH562> nor language <WH1697>; Their voice <WH6963> is not heard <WH8085>.

Their line <WH6957> is gone out <WH3318> through all the earth <WH776>, And their words <WH4405> to the end <WH7097> of the world <WH8398>. In them hath he set <WH7760> a tabernacle <WH168> for the sun <WH8121>,
Which is as a bridegroom <WH2860> coming out <WH3318> of his chamber <WH2646>, And rejoiceth <WH7797> as a strong man <WH1368> to run <WH7323> his course <WH734>.
His going forth <WH4161> is from the end <WH7097> of the heavens <WH8064>, And his circuit <WH8622> unto the ends <WH7098> of it <WH5641>; And there is nothing hid from the heat thereof <WH2535>.
The law <WH8451> of Jehovah <WH3068> is perfect <WH8549>, restoring <WH7725> the soul <WH5315>: The testimony <WH5715> of Jehovah <WH3068> is sure <WH539>, making wise <WH2449> the simple <WH6612>.

The precepts <WH6490> of Jehovah <WH3068> are right <WH3477>, rejoicing <WH8055> the heart <WH3820>: The commandment <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> is pure <WH1249>, enlightening <WH215> the eyes <WH5869>.
The fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068> is clean <WH2889>, enduring <WH5975> for ever <WH5703>: The ordinances <WH4941> of Jehovah <WH3068> are true <WH571>, and righteous <WH6663> altogether <WH3162>.
More to be desired <WH2530> are they than gold <WH2091>, yea <WH7227>, than much fine gold <WH6337>; Sweeter <WH4966> also than honey <WH1706> and the droppings of the honeycomb <WH5317>.
Moreover by them is thy servant <WH5650> warned <WH2094>: In keeping <WH8104> them there is great <WH7227> reward <WH6118>.
Who can discern <WH995> his errors <WH7691>? Clear <WH5352> thou me from hidden faults <WH5641>.

Keep back <WH2820> thy servant <WH5650> also from presumptuous <WH2086> sins <WH4910>; Let them not have dominion over me <WH8552>: Then shall I be upright, And I shall be clear <WH5352> from great <WH7227> transgression <WH6588>.

Let the words <WH561> of my mouth <WH6310> and the meditation <WH1902> of my heart <WH3820> Be acceptable <WH7522> in thy sight <WH6440>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, my rock <WH6697>, and my redeemer <WH1350>.
